https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tmLAaLVVlPTBCvVD0WGalkrBkl.jpg Following a bank robbery, the responsible gang stops by the home of one of their members and kidnaps his son. The sheriff enlists the aid of a retired gunfighter, who is the boy's grandfather. On the gang's trail, they find there are two bounty hunters also after the gang for crimes in Mexico. Desolation Canyon
